isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - ENGINE FAN CONTROL - ENGINE FAN CONTROL

svcproc.title: ENGINE FAN CONTROL
svcproc.para: This parameter indicates to the on-board electronics if this truck has the electronic engine fan control feature.
DISABLE: feature is turned off at all times.
COOLANT TEMP ACTIVATION ONLY: feature will allow fan activation based on coolant temperature only.
COOLANT TEMP ACTIVATION AND AS RETARDER: feature will allow fan activation based on coolant temperature or as a vehicle retarding device.
